title: Rio 2 2014 Special HD-TS XVID AC3 HQ Hive-CM8
description:
Rio.2.2014.Special.HD-TS.XVID.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources:

Video: 720p Italian HD-CAM
Audio: Millenium/Echo
thx

got that very nice hdcam - only default was that pulsating flickering, annoyed me within 5 mins

there are already cpl versions out, which all look pretty same to me,some even made 4 versions - wt*
wasnt gonna bother you with another one if there isnt anything worth improving, till i found something
thats worth my while

Encode:

I tried to get out that pulsating without effecting the video, tried cpl different methods and finally
suceeded - it can be removed nearly completely, took me cpl hours to get rid of it
looks perfect now!

Fixed brightness,sharpness,rgb,saturation,contrast, black balance and added sharpness

For the Audio i took Milleniums Line, since it sounded identical to blackpearls whoever got it from whom first i am thankful
Noticed the Line had loads of crackles in it, at the normal way I couldnt get them all out
had to go the extramile and make a complete recleaning process. looks like its clean now
noticed around 30 oos spots i had to fix, took me some while, should all be lipsync now

Will def. do me till retail - enjoy

Got very nice!

It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel and their three kids after they're hurtled Rio de Janeiro
to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel
and meets the most fearsome adversary of all: his father-in-law
